Module de.cuioss.uimodel

Package de.cuioss.uimodel.nameprovider

package de.cuioss.uimodel.nameprovider
Package include different implementations of DisplayNameProvider. The concept is to pass through any complex object which will be represented as String on UI by using typed Converter. In this way decoupling from BE object is provided.
Author:
Eugen Fischer
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    de.cuioss.uimodel.nameprovider.data
    This package provides class, which is an interface which can be used for transformation
  • Class
    Description
    CodeTypeDisplayNameProvider
    Instance of IDisplayNameProvider which indicates to provide display key that implements CodeType.
    DisplayMessageFormat
    Content which can be used to transfer message key and arguments.
    DisplayMessageFormat.Builder
    Provide creation of DisplayMessageProvider
    DisplayMessageProvider
    DisplayMessageProvider provide DisplayMessageFormat to be able to transport key and arguments which can be used for MessageFormat
    DisplayMessageProvider.Builder
    Provide creation of full initialized DisplayMessageProvider
    DisplayName
    Instance of IDisplayNameProvider which indicates to provide display name without need of resolving.
    I18nDisplayNameProvider
    Attention : stored translated text is NOT sanitized, on usage you need to care about!
    I18nDisplayNameProvider.Builder
    Builder for creation in safe way a I18nDisplayNameProvider
    IDisplayNameProvider<T>
    Interface IDisplayNameProvider indicates entity which provide content that need to be presented on ui.
    LabeledKey
    Instance of IDisplayNameProvider which indicates to provide display key that has a mapping to resource bundle key.
    LabelKeyProvider
    This interfaces defines objects that provide LabelKeys.
    TemporalAccessorDisplayNameProvider
    Displays instances of TemporalAccessor
